title: Teemo is...
body: Teemo is unvalabile for ... days?  How long can take to fix teemo pls respond anyone who knows

replies.body: As recompense for us Teemo mains, Teemo should receive a buff in the next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=I Push Buttons,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=47iFveZZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-15T21:47:41.033+0000)
>
> As recompense for us Teemo mains, Teemo should receive a buff in the next patch.

i'm almost 100% sure his q range is increasing, w cd/mana decreased, and passive changed for more range on first auto after stealth.. haven't been this happy since he was made to stealth while moving
Dont get my hopes up saying things like that.
I've been trying since yesterday bro. *nobody* knows when the little prince will be back. Pretty big delay for a simple bug! :(

If teemo stands in a bush while shooting he'll cloak between attacks, making him untargetable. From what I've been told, This bug is incredibly rare, only happens in howling abyss, and requires you to stay in the bushes to work.
they should just disable him in howling abyss then
It can happen in summoners rift as well. Although not untargetable, it still makes him stealth after attacking. It takes a bit of set up to make it work though.
I hope they make Rework on him because he is mu FAVORITE

Unfortunately, I have no further updates to share regarding Teemo's bug. I recommend keeping an eye on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for any updates to the message or when the message is removed for Teemo's re-enable.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
